clusterList.phrase: aligning these plans with the necp will move emergency communications forward and further promote a coordinated nationwide strategy

for the first time a plan has been developed that has engaged hundreds of public safety practitioners at all levels in a way that insures realistic and measurable goals and embraces the work completed by every state and territory through the statewide interoperable communications plans
we are deeply disturbed by this imminent loss of communications service to vital public safety agencies
this is a first an historic event and we've built a template showing that allegiances like this are critical i think from this we can actually work toward a national standard for emergency response
